function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient air distribution indoors","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Development of new and efficient technologies for disinfection of air in indoor spaces","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UVGI units, advanced air distribution methods","People":"Occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Researchers, engineers, experts in related fields"},{"Description":"Incomplete knowledge on pathogen transmission","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing the risk of airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Multidisciplinary research involving epidemiologists, hygienists, engineers, and experts in other fields","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, experts in related fields","Owner":"Researchers, experts in related fields"}]}
